scripts.build: npm run clean && react-scripts build && npm run copy-assets && npm run optimize-assets
scripts.copy-assets: robocopy public\Images build\Images /E /NFL /NDL /NJH /NJS && robocopy public\Video build\Video /E /NFL /NDL /NJH /NJS
scripts.optimize-assets: cwebp -q 80 public/Images/**/*.png -o build/Images/ -e .webp && ffmpeg -i public/Video/**/*.mp4 -vcodec libx264 -crf 28 -preset fast build/Video/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
